name: ProgressViewStyle
desc: A type that applies standard interaction behavior to all progress views within a view hierarchy.

items.name: static var automatic: DefaultProgressViewStyle
items.desc: The default progress view style in the current context of the view being styled.

items.name: static var circular: CircularProgressViewStyle
items.desc: A progress view that visually indicates its progress using a circular gauge.

items.name: static var linear: LinearProgressViewStyle
items.desc: A progress view that visually indicates its progress using a horizontal bar.

items.name: func makeBody(configuration: Self.Configuration) -> Self.Body
items.desc: Creates a view representing the body of a progress view.

items.name: typealias Configuration
items.desc: A type alias for the properties of a progress view instance.

items.name: associatedtype Body : View
items.desc: A view representing the body of a progress view.

items.name: struct DefaultProgressViewStyle
items.desc: The default progress view style in the current context of the view being styled.

items.name: struct CircularProgressViewStyle
items.desc: A progress view that visually indicates its progress using a circular gauge.

items.name: struct LinearProgressViewStyle
items.desc: A progress view that visually indicates its progress using a horizontal bar.
